ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-30 08:30:42. [Issue ID 2551682]
ComicInfo.Summary: Action! Horror! Adventure! The CURSEDVERSE is here! Welcome to a brand-new universe of comic books inspired by the best pulp characters and comics from the 1980s & 90s! Come with us as we introduce four new series that bring the fun and excitement back to comic books. Remember when comics were fun? We do! And we're bringing back those days when you were excited to see new characters debuting and when their adventures had lasting consequences not just erased and rebooted every six months. This issue is the ultimate primer and introduces the first wave of CursedVerse characters! High flying adventure with Bombshell & TommTomm! Supernatural horror with Witch Hammer! Beyond the grave justice with The Cemetorian! And violent revenge at the hands of The Night Terror! It all STARTS HERE! Don't miss out on the biggest comics event of 2023!
